title: Font style of customized button
content:

It's a customized button of an app. Can you determine this guys?

Thanks!

comments.content:
There are many versions of this typeface, but here's one link:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/stencil/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132050/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/stencil/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/stencil/")
Or were you looking for just the "i"?
